semantics.label: Behavioural settings.
semantics.description: These options will let you control how the task behaves.

fields.label: Enable "Retry"
fields.description: Add a "Retry" button when the game is over. This will simply refresh the current URL. It may not work in some environments, so please check on your platform before enabling it!

fields.label: Case sensitive
fields.description: Makes sure the user input has to be exactly the same as the answer.

fields.label: Enable Number of words Choice
fields.description: Check this option to allow the user to select the number of words (per sentence) to guess. Do NOT check this option if your sentences make up a story!

fields.label: Enable "End Game" button
fields.description: Check this if you want to allow the player to quit the game without having guessed the current sentence

fields.description: If a sentence has an audio attached to it, select WHEN you want to display the audio buttons.

options.label: Only when the blanks have been correctly filled in

fields.label: Display Guessed Sentences
fields.description: Check this to add each guessed sentence to a display list after each successful attempt. This option is useful if your sentences make up a story.

fields.label: Display audio and tip buttons in Guessed Sentences
fields.description: Select how you want to display the audio and tip buttons in front of each sentence in the list of guessed sentences.

fields.label: Sentences Order
fields.description: Select the order in which the sentences will be displayed to the user. Do NOT check this option if your sentences make up a story!
